text: Bács-Kiskun is an administrative county in Hungary. The capital of Bács-Kiskun county is Kecskemét. It is in the southern part of the country. It borders with the Hungarian counties Baranya, Csongrád-Csanád, Fejér, Jász-Nagykun- Szolnok, Pest and Tolna. In 2019, 503,825 people lived there. Its area is 8,445 km².
title: Bács-Kiskun County
